org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRErrorInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRErrorInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRErrorInfo
extends Struct
    Provides information about the last error.

    ovrErrorInfo members

    MemberTypeDescription
    ResultovrResultthe result from the last API call that generated an error ovrResult
    ErrorStringchar[512]a UTF8-encoded null-terminated English string describing the problem. The format of this string is subject to change in future versions

      • OVRErrorInfo

        public OVRErrorInfo(long struct)
        Creates a OVRErrorInfo instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRErrorInfo

        public OVRErrorInfo(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRErrorInfo instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
